00014 {
00015         assert(representativeBitLength >= MinRepresentativeBitLength(hashIdentifier.second, hash.DigestSize()));
00016

00018                 throw PK_SignatureScheme::InvalidKeyLength("EMSA2: EMSA2 requires a key length that is a multiple of 8");
00019 
00020         size_t digestSize = hash.DigestSize();
00021         size_t representativeByteLength = BitsToBytes(representativeBitLength);
00022 
00023         representative[0] = messageEmpty ? 0x4b : 0x6b;

00029         representative[representativeByteLength-1] = 0xcc;
